==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Tenebrous Mimiflora

|name_1      = Mimicry
|desc_1      = When entering battle, takes the form of a [[Ruin Guard]]. While in this form, the Tenebrous Mimiflora possesses a Void Ward which grants it immunity to DMG until destroyed. Depending on the form it takes, the Void Ward will have a durability of '''105'''. The durability will reduce by '''1''' when hit by an Elemental attack, or '''3''' when hit by a [[Nightsoul]]-aligned attack.<br><br>When durability is depleted, the Tenebrous Mimiflora will return to its true form and become briefly stunned, but will re-transform after some time. However, when generating the Void Ward for the second time, then from the third time onward, its durability will be reduced to '''53''' and '''21''' respectively.

|name_2      = Attrition
|desc_2      = Some of the Mimiflora's attacks inflict stacks of Attrition on hit. The amount of stacks inflicted depends on the attack. For each stack, the affected character will lose [[HP]] equal to '''1% Max HP + 50''' after a short delay.

|name_3      = Abyssal Impalement
|desc_3      = While in its true form, shoots forward a trail of spikes, dealing '''20% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicting '''1''' stack of '''Attrition''' on hit.

|name_4      = Abyssal Spheres
|desc_4      = While in its true form, shoots 3 homing projectiles, each dealing '''20% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicting '''1''' stack of '''Attrition''' on hit.

|name_5      = Stomp and Clap
|desc_5      = Raises one of its feet and stomps the ground, dealing '''62.5% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. If a player is still within melee range after the stomp, the Ruin Guard may lean down and clap powerfully using its hands, dealing '''87.5% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} in front of itself.

|name_6      = Punch and Jump Combo
|desc_6      = Bringing both fists together before performing, it will do spinning punches twice, dealing '''50% ATK''' and '''75% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}, before jumping into the air and landing onto the player's location (telegraphed by a red circle) and dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_7      = Suppressive Volley
|desc_7      = Swivels their upper body around 180° and aims its missile cannons towards the player. Shortly after, a red crosshair will appear on the Ruin Guard's target, and will then fire a swarm of 6 Seeking Missiles. These missiles each deal '''31.25% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} on hit.

|name_8      = Teleport Stomp
|desc_8      = Teleports to the player, raises one of its feet and stomps the ground, dealing '''62.5% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicting '''15''' stacks of '''Attrition'''.

|name_9      = Teleport Clap
|desc_9      = Teleports to the player, leans down and claps powerfully using its hands, dealing '''87.5% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicting '''15''' stacks of '''Attrition'''.

|name_10      = Teleport Jump
|desc_10      = Teleports to the player, jumps into the air and lands onto the player's location (telegraphed by a red circle), dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicting '''15''' stacks of '''Attrition'''. Then, leans down and claps powerfully using its hands, dealing '''87.5% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}, but without inflicting Attrition.

|name_11      = Teleport Suppressive Volley
|desc_11      = Teleports some distance from the player, and fires a swarm of 6 Seeking Missiles. These missiles each deals '''31.25% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicts '''4''' stacks of '''Attrition''' on hit.
}}
